config.do_a_barrel_roll.title: §lDo a Barrel Roll
config.do_a_barrel_roll.controls.switch_: Switch the roll and yaw axis. not recommended, but might make flying easier for some people.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.controls.momentu: Makes it easier to make continuous movements with the mouse. Takes some getting used to.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.controls.show_mo: Turn the crosshair into a helpful widget when using the momentum based camera.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.controls.activat:
Configures how the Elytra is activated.

§lVANILLA§r: Same as vanilla; jump in midair.
§lTRIPLE_JUMP§r: Requires you to jump twice in midair instead of once.
§lHYBRID§r: Jumping once in midair activates standard vanilla flight, jumping again after that enables the mod.
§lHYBRID_TOGGLE§r: Same as HYBRID, but jumping toggles the mod instead of just enabling it once.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.banking.enable_b: Banking slightly yaws the camera when rolling, creating a more realistic, plane-like feeling.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.thrust.enable_th:
Enables you to use the forward and back keys (W and S by default) 
to infinitely accelerate and decelerate respectively. 
This is a very cheaty feature, and can be used to fly very fast. 
§4This is very likely to flag anti cheat on just about any server. 
Use at your own risk.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.thrust.max_thrus:
The maximum speed that can be reached by thrusting. 
Setting this to anything above 2-3 will probably 
cause problems with chunks not loading fast enough.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.thrust.thrust_ac:
The acceleration of thrusting. 
Higher values will make it easier to reach max speed.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.controller.pitch: Only applicable when MidnightControls is installed.
config.do_a_barrel_roll.controller.yaw.d: Only applicable when MidnightControls is installed.
Only applicable when MidnightControls is installed.
toast.do_a_barrel_roll.thrusting_disable: §cElytra thrusting is not allowed on this server, the feature will be forcibly disabled. Disable it in your client config to remove this message.
